snippet: At issue is whether the N.H.L. will take a break of 16 days or more to allow its players to travel to Russia for the Olympic men’s ice hockey tournament, which will begin in 51 weeks.
abstract: Debate over whether NHL players will participate in 2014 Olympic Games enters critical stage with series of meetings between league and Olympic officials in New York.
lead_paragraph: At issue is whether the N.H.L. will take a break of 16 days or more to allow its players to travel to Russia for the Olympic men’s ice hockey tournament, which will begin in 51 weeks.

headline.seo: N.H.L. Enters Key Talks in Dispute Over Olympic Participation
headline.main: Key Talks Set Over N.H.L. Participation in Olympics
headline.print_headline: Key Talks Set Over N.H.L. Participation In Olympics
